last_assistant_message:
## Task Complete

**Task**: Implement Document Service (MS-06) & Settings Service (MS-13)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:

**Document Service (MS-06)** — 17 tests passing:
- Prisma schema with Document, DocumentDownload, AuditLog
- DocumentService with payslip/tax cert/employment cert generation (HR-gated), paginated document listing, download with audit trail (F4.3), soft delete
- 3 HTML generators (Payslip, TaxCert, Certificate)
- Full controller with RESTful endpoints

**Settings Service (MS-13)** — 22 tests passing:
- Prisma schema with Setting + SettingAudit (audit trail)
- SettingsService with CRUD, grouped retrieval, leave policy/payroll/notification settings
- HR Manager-only write access, system settings deletion protection
- Seed data from mock-settings.js (company, payroll, tax brackets, leave policies)

**Verification**: `npx jest --no-cache` passes in both services (39 total tests)
